targets.query: SELECT last("scur") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "sv" = 'FRONTEND' fill(null)

panels.description: Number of sessions used in percent of total number of sessions available.

targets.query: SELECT ((last("scur") / last("slim")) * 100) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "sv" = 'FRONTEND' fill(0)

panels.title: Sessions Usage

panels.description:
requests denied because of security concerns.
     - For tcp this is because of a matched tcp
       request content rule.
     - For http this is because of a matched http
       request or tarpit rule.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("dreq")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND "sv" = 'FRONTEND' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

panels.title: Denied requests rate

panels.description:
Request errors. Some of the possible causes are:
     - early termination from the client, before the
       request has been sent.
     - read error from the client
     - client timeout
     - client closed connection
     - various bad requests from the client.
     - request was tar-pitted

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("ereq")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND "sv" = 'FRONTEND' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(0)

panels.title: Request errors rate

panels.description: Number of connections awaiting assignment to a backend server

targets.query: SELECT last("qcur") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Connections waiting for assignment

panels.description: HTTP requests per second over last elapsed second

targets.query: SELECT derivative(last("http_response.1xx")) AS "HTTP 1xx" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Requests rate

panels.description: Number of sessions received per second over last elapsed second

targets.query: SELECT mean("rate") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND "sv" = 'FRONTEND' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Sessions rate

targets.query: SELECT derivative(last("http_response.1xx")) AS "HTTP 1xx" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND "sv" = 'FRONTEND' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

SELECT derivative(last("http_response.2xx")) AS "HTTP 2xx" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND "sv" = 'FRONTEND' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

SELECT derivative(last("http_response.3xx")) AS "HTTP 3xx" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND "sv" = 'FRONTEND' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

SELECT derivative(last("http_response.4xx")) AS "HTTP 4xx" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND "sv" = 'FRONTEND' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

SELECT derivative(last("http_response.5xx")) AS "HTTP 5xx" FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND "sv" = 'FRONTEND' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.description: Number of bytes received by the frontends

targets.query: SELECT derivative(last("bin")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND "sv" = 'FRONTEND' AND $timeFilter) GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Bytes received

panels.description: Number of bytes sent by the frontends

targets.query: SELECT derivative(last("bout")) FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND "sv" = 'FRONTEND' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Bytes sent

panels.description:
Requests denied because of security concerns.
- For tcp this is because of a matched tcp
  request content rule.
- For http this is because of a matched http
  request or tarpit rule.

targets.query: SELECT last("dreq") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Frontend requests denied

panels.description:
Request errors. Some of the possible causes are:
- early termination from the client, before the
  request has been sent.
- read error from the client
   - client timeout
   - client closed connection
   - various bad requests from the client.
   - request was tarpitted.

targets.query: SELECT last("ereq") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Frontend requests errors

panels.description: Average backend response time (in ms) for the last 1,024 requests

targets.query: SELECT mean("rtime") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Backend average response time (ms)

panels.description: Number of requests that encountered an error attempting to connect to a backend server

targets.query: SELECT last("econ") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Backend requests denied

panels.description: Responses denied due to security concerns (ACL-restricted)

targets.query: SELECT last("dresp") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Backend responses denied

panels.description: Number of requests whose responses yielded an error

targets.query: SELECT last("eresp") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Backend failed requests

panels.description: Shows backends with a status_check not OK

styles.linkTooltip: Click to see the HAProxy documentation

targets.query: SELECT "proxy", "check_status" FROM (SELECT last("check_status") AS "check_status", "proxy" AS "proxy" FROM "haproxy" GROUP BY "proxy") WHERE "check_status" !~ /OK/

panels.title: Backend connection errors

panels.description: Number of times a connection was retried

targets.query: SELECT last("wretr") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Backend connection retries

panels.description: Number of times a request was redispatched to a different backend

targets.query: SELECT last("wredis") FROM "haproxy" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "proxy" =~ /^$proxy$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "proxy" fill(null)

panels.title: Backend redispatch rate

list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "haproxy" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: proxy
list.name: proxy
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "haproxy" WITH KEY = "proxy"

list.name: sv
